FuncDef: This command is used to adjust the sensitivity of the virtual scheduler to changes in the child offered rate. As the child offered rate is determined, it is compared to the previous offered rate. If the delta does not exceed the sensitivity threshold determined for the current offered rate, the change in offered rate is ignored for that iteration.

ParaDef.Info: When the percent qualifier is used, this parameter specifies the percentage of the child s administrative PIR that are used as the threshold sensitivity to offered rate change. If a value of 0 or 0.00 is used, the system will interpret this equivalent to no granularity. Values-1.00 to 100.00.

When the rate qualifier is used, this parameter specifies an explicit rate, in kb/s, that are used as the child s offered rate change sensitivity value. If a rate sensitivity of 0 is specified, the system interprets this equivalent to no granularity. Values-0 to 100,000,000.
